description: A peach margarita is a refreshing and delicious twist on the classic cocktail. Made with tequila, peach schnapps, lime juice, and fresh peaches, this drink is perfect for summer parties or any time you need a little pick-me-up.
name: Peach Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Rub the rim of a rocks glass or margarita glass with lime and rim with sugar, salt, or tajín.
recipeInstructions.text: Rub the rim of a rocks glass or margarita glass with lime and rim with sugar, salt, or tajín.

recipeInstructions.name: Add peach schnapps, tequila, lime juice, and blended peach (optional) in a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add peach schnapps, tequila, lime juice, and blended peach (optional) in a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake the mixture well until combined thoroughly and frothy.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake the mixture well until combined thoroughly and frothy.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into ice-filled glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or peach slice.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into ice-filled glass. Garnish with a lime wheel or peach slice.
